name: MDB Internal API: HTTP slow queries by DC

elements.title: sas
elements.expression: (avg({host="api-*", sensor="int_api_dbaas_internal_api_count_dmmm", dc="sas"}) by sensor) - (avg({host="api-*", sensor="int_api_dbaas_internal_api_timings_less_1000_dmmm", dc="sas"}) by sensor)

elements.title: myt
elements.expression: (avg({host="api-*", sensor="int_api_dbaas_internal_api_count_dmmm", dc="myt"}) by sensor) - (avg({host="api-*", sensor="int_api_dbaas_internal_api_timings_less_1000_dmmm", dc="myt"}) by sensor)

elements.title: vla
elements.expression: (avg({host="api-*", sensor="int_api_dbaas_internal_api_count_dmmm", dc="vla"}) by sensor) - (avg({host="api-*", sensor="int_api_dbaas_internal_api_timings_less_1000_dmmm", dc="vla"}) by sensor)
